name: Bağır ve Ağla
description:
It is a co-op endless runner which will damage your friendships. Prepare your throats to shout.

ISTRUCTIONS:

player 1:

Use "v" "b" to avoid the obstacles
Beware and write the ground's colour aswell

player 2:

Command and help player 1 about what to type
Use arrow keys to avoid obstacles
